subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Stefan/SJ-Allophones_without_diphthongs.wav 
  Uploaded by : evpfan <yahoogroups@...> 
  Description : The same SpeakJet allophones, but without the 16 diphthongs which sound like one-syllable words as "I", "ear", "you", "air", etc. (so this file contains only 56 allophones, which might be too less). 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Stefan/SJ-Allophones_without_diphthongs.wav 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

evpfan <yahoogroups@...>
